name: url
label: URL
help: Enter the API endpoint path (e.g., /agent, /agent/123/device). The base URL and authentication are handled automatically.

name: method
label: Method
help: Select the HTTP method for the API request.

name: headers
label: Headers
help: Additional HTTP headers to include in the request. The X-Api-Key authentication header is automatically added.

name: qs
label: Query String
help: Query string parameters to append to the URL.

name: body
label: Body
help: The request body (for POST, PUT, PATCH methods). Can be JSON or other formats.
